nodes.text: Kerru was a blaster-wielding male Gotal and a regular patron of Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina as of 0 BBY.

Kerru appeared as a miniature figure in 1989's Mos Eisley Cantina Adventure Set. Since the official summary of the boxed set suggests each figure represents a "familiar character" from Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, it is likely Kerru was intended to be one of the film's later-named Gotal characters: Feltipern Trevagg, Cobb Sonbepol, and Hennet Kayn.
